koohiiStory1: Righteous Christians are sheep with egos (reworked from raulir, fixes word order to match radical order).
koohiiStory2: On the other hand, Woman tend to have too much self-righteousness to allow any man to touch their wooly black sheep this results in similar hand fiestas.
myStory: luôn đúng. đạo đức. trung thành. tự con dê. bản thân con dê
words:
義理(ぎり): duty, sense of duty, honor, decency, courtesy, debt of gratitude, social obligation
主義(しゅぎ): doctrine, rule, principle
正義(せいぎ): justice, right, righteousness, correct meaning
定義(ていぎ): definition
意義(いぎ): meaning, significance
義務(ぎむ): duty, obligation, responsibility
講義(こうぎ): lecture
